_sText:
This map is a redux of an already existing map called gg_csbase.
It has been done by request of several admins who thought the original was just a tad bit too big. This has also been done with the approval of the original author!

Basically it is a smaller version of the original map with 2 new features:

- Glass (unbreakable) windows on top floor for anti-camp.
- Breakable rock at the sides, making it possible to sculpt your own windows.

I hope this won't raise angry eyes, because once again: it has been done with the approval of the original author (and the credits still remain in the custom texture display)
